headline: Billionaires Are Buying Up This Millionaire-Maker Stock
summary: Philip Morris International (NYSE: PM) is up 38% so far in 2024 as it has successfully pivoted to next-generation smoke-free products, including Iqos heat-not-burn sticks and Zyn nicotine pouches.  Stanley Druckenmiller's Duquesne Family Office bought 245,280 shares of Philip Morris in the quarter, bringing its grand total to 1.13 million.  Druckenmiller is known for running the Duquesne Capital Management hedge fund for nearly three decades with an average annual return of 30% and no losing years.

headline: Philip Morris: Market Dominance In Smoke-Free Products Driving A Compelling Growth Story
summary: Philip Morris International is the largest tobacco company in the world by both market cap and sales. See why I rate PM stock a buy now.
